languages.text: {n}Темные глаза суживаются.{/n} "Мне не нужно твое доверие, {name}. Я предлагаю тебе... познать нечто новое".
{n}His dark eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "I do not need your trust, {name}. I am offering you a chance... to learn something new."
languages.original_text: {n}Темные глаза суживаются.{/n} "Мне не нужно твое доверие, {name}. Я предлагаю тебе... познать нечто новое".

traits.locale_text: {n}His dark eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "I do not need your trust, {name}. I am offering you a chance... to learn something new."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}他的黑眼睛眯成了一条缝。{/n}“我并不需要你的信任，{name}。我给你个机会……学习新东西的机会。”
languages.original_text: {n}His dark eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "I do not need your trust, {name}. I am offering you a chance... to learn something new."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的黑眼睛眯成了一条缝。{/n}“我并不需要你的信任，{name}。我给你个机会……学习新东西的机会。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、その黒い瞳をスッと細める。{/n}「別に信じてもらわなくても結構だ、{name}。お前には何か…新しい事を学ぶ機会をやろう」
languages.original_text: {n}His dark eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "I do not need your trust, {name}. I am offering you a chance... to learn something new."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、その黒い瞳をスッと細める。{/n}「別に信じてもらわなくても結構だ、{name}。お前には何か…新しい事を学ぶ機会をやろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sus ojos oscuros se entornan hasta que apenas queda una rendija entre sus párpados.{/n} «No necesito tu confianza, {name}. Lo que te brindo es una oportunidad para... aprender algo nuevo».
languages.original_text: {n}His dark eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "I do not need your trust, {name}. I am offering you a chance... to learn something new."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus ojos oscuros se entornan hasta que apenas queda una rendija entre sus párpados.{/n} «No necesito tu confianza, {name}. Lo que te brindo es una oportunidad para... aprender algo nuevo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ses yeux sombres s'étrécissent aussitôt.{/n} « Je n'ai que faire de votre confiance, {name}. Je vous offre une chance... une chance d'apprendre quelque chose de nouveau. »
languages.original_text: {n}His dark eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "I do not need your trust, {name}. I am offering you a chance... to learn something new."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses yeux sombres s'étrécissent aussitôt.{/n} « Je n'ai que faire de votre confiance, {name}. Je vous offre une chance... une chance d'apprendre quelque chose de nouveau. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Er presst seine dunklen Augen zu kleinen Schlitzen zusammen.{/n} "Ich brauche nicht Euer Vertrauen, {name}. Ich biete Euch die Chance an ... etwas Neues kennenzulernen."
languages.original_text: {n}His dark eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "I do not need your trust, {name}. I am offering you a chance... to learn something new."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er presst seine dunklen Augen zu kleinen Schlitzen zusammen.{/n} "Ich brauche nicht Euer Vertrauen, {name}. Ich biete Euch die Chance an ... etwas Neues kennenzulernen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gözleri kısılarak çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Güvenine ihtiyacım yok {name}. Sana... Yeni bir şey öğrenme şansı sunuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}His dark eyes narrow to slits.{/n} "I do not need your trust, {name}. I am offering you a chance... to learn something new."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözleri kısılarak çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Güvenine ihtiyacım yok {name}. Sana... Yeni bir şey öğrenme şansı sunuyorum."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
